verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is my <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>; I shall not <S%H2637>want<s%>.
He maketh me to lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H1877>green<s%> <S%H4999>pastures<s%>; He <S%H5095>leadeth<s%> me beside <S%H4496>still<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>.
He <S%H7725>restoreth<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: He <S%H5148>guideth<s%> me in the <S%H4570>paths<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> for his <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake.

Yea <S%H3212><s%>, thou I walk through the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>, I will <S%H3372>fear<s%> no <S%H7451>evil<s%>; for thou art with <S%H7626>me<s%>; Thy rod and thy <S%H4938>staff<s%>, they comfort <S%H5162>me<s%>.

Thou <S%H6186>preparest<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in the presence of mine <S%H6887>enemies<s%>: Thou hast <S%H1878>anointed<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>; My <S%H3563>cup<s%> runneth <S%H7310>over<s%>.

Surely <S%H2896>goodness<s%> and <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> shall <S%H7291>follow<s%> me all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>; And I shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for <S%H753>ever<s%>.
